name: Racecar racecaR [Ludum Dare 47]
description:
Controls:

W = Accelerate

S = Reverse

A = Left

D = Right

Space Bar = Brake

Right Shift = Drift

How To Play:

Try to finish the race before time runs out. Each completion of a lap spawns 2 past versions of yourself (one going forward and one going backwards). Don't let your current self touch your past self or it can lead to devastating consequences.

If you finish the race before time runs out then you broke the loop. The countdown timer will now be your completion time.

Credits:

Russ Moonbase - Code, Design

Car Model made with Asset Forge https://assetforge.io/

Additional Assets Used:

Race Track Models by Kenney https://www.kenney.nl/

HyperCasual Music Pack by VOiD1 Gaming https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/hypercasual-music-pack-demo-16...

Engine Sound by Kristian Grundström https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/engines-123836

Hit Sound by SoundBits https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/soundbits-free-sound-fx-col...
